name: HouseLamonte
_source: s;Lamonte;This was Leod's house.{w}{c:expression;Lamonte;HalfCloseEyes} I remember when he hired me, so long ago now.{w}{clear}That man...{w} he was never the leader I'd wished he was.{w}{c:expression;Lamonte;CloseEyes} If I'd known,|maybe I wouldn't have taken the job.
s;SLamonte;...{w} and that's why, sir, I think you should reconsider.{w} I mean, we can't-!
s;SLeod;But we *can*, can't we, Lamonte?{w}{clear}I've heard your plea, but the pier is simply a poor allocation of funds.

s;SLamonte;But surely, if you feel that way, there are better options for them!{w}{clear}I-I mean, what about repairing the roads?{w} Or funding Elwynn's school?{w}{clear}Improving the market square, maybe?
s;SLeod;Are you telling me what to do?
s;SLamonte;...{w} I'm just giving my thoughts.
s;SLeod;Well, I don't pay you for those.{w}{clear}Lamonte, do you know what happens to grunts who think too much?
s;SLeod;They start to stray from the path.{w}{clear}It's a terrible thing, really.{w} A life of crime, and eventually exile.{w}{clear}You wouldn't want to be branded a criminal, would you, Lamonte?
s;SLeod;I'm simply advising you to remember your place.{w} You are a bodyguard.{w}{clear}Not an advisor, or an advocate.{w} You hold no power.{w} That's my job.{w} Got it?

s;SLeod;Good.{w} Now, I think we should put some life into the local tourism!{w}{clear}And what greater attraction does our town have than my great manor, hmm?{w}{clear}Does that sound like a good idea to you, my dear and loyal Lamonte?
s;SLamonte;It sounds great.{w} The people will love it.{w} The town needs this.
s;SLeod;Mhmhm!{w} Exactly, exactly! Isn't this so much easier, my good man? Hmm?

s;Lamonte;Well, Garvey...{w} you got your wish in the end.{w}{c:expression;Lamonte;OpenEyes} That vile man's dead.{w}{clear}And now...{w} there's nobody to help rebuild.{w} The town's a ruin, now...{w}{clear}I suppose...{w} somebody's gotta step up and take his place.{w} It...{w} could be me.{w}{clear}I mean, I'm not sure I know how to lead, but...{w} I know this town well.{w}{clear}I know what we need.{w} Trade is our lifeblood, so investing in that...|From there, we can expand out...|grow our borders, more people,|more coin, more trade, more...{w} life.{w}{clear}Aye...{w} more life.{w} I wonder if that's even possible after all this...?
